subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Los Angeles Clippers have acquired center Marcus Camby from the Denver Nuggets for a future second-round draft pick. Camby led the N.B.A. in blocked shots with 3.61 a game last season; he is only the second player to do so in three straight seasons. He averaged 9.1 points and 13.1 rebounds last season.
